articles.content: Seema Sajdeh, who was earlier married to actor Sohail Khan, spoke about her divorce with the actor on the new season of Netflix’s Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives. As Seema changes the ‘Khan’ namepl… [+1731 chars]

articles.author: Alice Scarsi, Richard Palmer
articles.title: Queen pulls out of beloved Highland Games for first time in reign over health woes - Express
articles.description: THE QUEEN will miss for the first time in her reign a much-beloved event.

articles.title: Anne Heche died without a will, son files to control estate - The Associated Press
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Actor Anne Heche  died without a will, and her 20-year-old son has filed court papers to control her estate.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES (AP) Actor Anne Heche died without a will, and her 20-year-old son has filed court papers to control her estate.
